original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 7.22. Sanidassanattika
analyzed: sani dassana ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na sanidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na a nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: hetu paccayā na a nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
analyzed: na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca na a nidassana appaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca na a nidassana sappaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cha

original: Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: (Yathā kusalattike sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi gaṇitaṁ evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala ttike sahajāta vāram pi paccaya vāram pi nissaya vāram pi sa saṭṭha vāram pi sampayutta vāram pi pañhā vāram pi gaṇitam evam gaṇetabba
